akn:subsection.akn:heading: Inspection of instructional materials by parents or guardians

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Inspection of instructional materials by parents or guardians All instructional materials, including teacher’s manuals, films, tapes, or other supplementary material which will be used in connection with any survey, analysis, or evaluation as part of any applicable program shall be available for inspection by the parents or guardians of the children.

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Limits on survey, analysis, or evaluations

akn:content.akn:p: (b) Limits on survey, analysis, or evaluations No student shall be required, as part of any applicable program, to submit to a survey, analysis, or evaluation that reveals information concerning— without the prior consent of the student (if the student is an adult or emancipated minor), or in the case of an unemancipated minor, without the prior written consent of the parent.

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Development of local policies concerning student privacy, parental access to information, and administration of certain physical examinations to minors

akn:content.akn:p: (c) Development of local policies concerning student privacy, parental access to information, and administration of certain physical examinations to minors
(d) Notice Educational agencies and institutions shall give parents and students effective notice of their rights under this section.

(f) Office and review board The Secretary shall establish or designate an office and review board within the Department of Education to investigate, process, review, and adjudicate violations of the rights established under this section.
